resources.string: Congratulations! You have found a mistake in the algorithm!

string-array.name: helpers
string-array.item:
Main input type: like x^4 + 2x^3 + 3x^2 + 4x + 5 - allows transpositions, long numbers and vars: x, n, t
Also you can enter '1 2 3 4', it means x^3 + 2x^2 + 3x + 4 - allows long numbers
Final type: 1234, it means the same, but numbers can consist only one figure.

Enter a polynom and click button OK (Enter) on the keyboard.\nIf the field is bigger than 20 (number was chosen by chance), the algorithm of probability will be used, which will be stopped on 10000 iteration, if won\'t work.(Usually it doesn\'t save from stopping, if stopping, quit by removing the app from active ones and enter again)\n
MOD and GCD of two given polynoms A and B.\n

Reverse item of main polynom in Fp[x]/(ideal polynom).
Reverse item * main polynom == 1 in this field.
Ideal polynom needs to be primary.
